name: Ts-error-measures
tagline: Computing error measures for time-series forecasting with Javascript
body: # ts-error-measures Computing error measures for time-series forecasting with javascript. Equations have been taken from: Rob J. Hyndman and Anne B. Koehler, "Another look at measures of forecast accuracy", International Journal of Forecasting (2006). 22(4), 679-688.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
